about_the_game:
Riser of Babel is endless 2d jump platform puzzle game.
Avoid all obstacles and get high as you can!

Classic Mode
Stack different shapes block to avoid flame from bottom and to get higher score!
Flame and block drop cycle will getting faster!

Rage from above
Existence from sky found you!
Avoid Debris from sky and keep advance for top!

Sisyphus challenge
Are all these things meaningless?
Avoid Lighting Strike has Knockback and recover what its broke
Keep stack and leap despite of hardship of Thunder!

Dual control option
Is all these things are too easy for you?
Don’t worry, You can control blocks and character simultaneously!
All Hardship and drops going much faster in this option!

name: Riser of Babel

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Avoid all obstacles and get high as you can! Riser of Babel is endless 2d jump platform puzzle game. Stack different style blocks for your character and run for higher score! Master stacking tower and challenge for avoid falling debris and critical lighting!
